data.name: WWE 2K22 - Stand Back Pack
data.detailed_description:
Stand back, there’s a Hurricane coming through! The Stand Back Pack features The Hurricane, Stacy Keibler, and NXT’s A-Kid and Wes Lee.

Each playable Superstar comes with their own MyFACTION EVO cards and the pack also includes bonus Booker T EVO and Seth Rollins Sapphire MyFACTION cards.

The Stand Back Pack is already included in the WWE 2K22 Season Pass.

data.short_description: The Stand Back Pack features The Hurricane, Stacy Keibler, A-Kid, and Wes Lee. Each playable Superstar comes with their own MyFACTION EVO cards and the pack includes bonus Booker T EVO and Seth Rollins Sapphire MyFACTION cards. The Stand Back Pack is included in the WWE 2K22 Season Pass.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3550 / AMD FX 8150 (AVX - Compatible processor)
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: At least 4 GB Video Memory
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790 / AMD FX 8350 (AVX - Compatible processor)
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: At least 6 GB Video Memory
